wikipedia_page.main: Sir Cecil Dennistoun Burney, 3rd Baronet (8 January 1923 – 19 April 2002) was a British businessman and politician in Zambia (1959-1970), having emigrated in 1951 but returning to Britain in 1970.

response: In 1921, he married Gladys High, who was originally from Chicago. They had a son in 1923, Cecil Dennistoun Burney, who succeeded his father in the Burney baronetcy in 1968.
